Serialized Form

  • Package application

    • Class application.Control

      class Control extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundColor
          Color backgroundColor
          backgroundColor is an object containing the color of the background.
        • box
          RenderBounds box
          RenderBounds is a box which bounds an equilateral triangle.
        • canvas
          application.Control.DrawCanvas canvas
        • deflectionX
          double deflectionX
          deflectionX is a variable which specifies horizontal movement of the fractal.
        • deflectionY
          double deflectionY
          deflectionY is a variable which specifies vertical movement of the fractal.
        • fractalColor
          Color fractalColor
          fractalColor is an object containing the color of the fractal.
        • fractalDepth
          int fractalDepth
          fractalDepth is a variable which stores the degree of the fractal.
        • labelSize
          int labelSize
          labelSize Dimension object which contains the size of imaeg saved label.
        • lblImageSaved
          JLabel lblImageSaved
          lblImageSaved is an isntance JLabel object which displays info about a saved image. upon saving
        • mousePosX
          int mousePosX
          mousePosX is a variable which stores the x position of the mouse.
        • mousePosY
          int mousePosY
          mousePosX is a variable which stores the y position of the mouse.
        • origin
          Point origin
          origin is a Point object which contains the x and y coordinates of the center of the canvas.
        • originalX
          int originalX
          originalX Used to know which direction fractal should be panned.
        • originalY
          int originalY
          originalY Used to know which direction fractal should be panned.
        • p1
          Point p1
          p1 is the topmost point.
        • p2
          Point p2
          p2 is the bottom-left point.
        • p3
          Point p3
          p3 is the bottom-right point.
        • panSpeed
          double panSpeed
          panSpeed is an object-dependent variable which controls the speed at which dragging pans the fractal.
        • scrollFactor
          int scrollFactor
          scrollFactor is a variable which influences how "zoomed in" a fractal is.
        • xResolution
          int xResolution
          xResolution is a variable which stores the horizontal resolution of the window.
        • yResolution
          int yResolution
          yResolution is a variable which stores the vertical resolution of the window.
        • zoomSpeed
          double zoomSpeed
          zoomSpeed is a variable which controls the speed at which the image zooms in/out.
